embed.description: So Jhin came out. so i played him. i think i am now ready to teach you how to play him. this how you actually play him i swear. legit guide. don't take my cheese. ✌(⌐■_■)☞ 10 likes??

replies.body:
Just some tips from an equally as small youtuber.

Speak up a bit more trust me, confidence = views (hence why my autistic anxious shitstain of a personality is currently not getting views, ive been in a 2 year heavy weight boxing match with my camera... some day i will pummel it into submission make it my bitch and show my true confidence over that glorious medium)

Your editing is actually really good for someone thats pretty much just started, though considering the style you are going for you may want to cut down on the scene times every so slightly, remember your audience has the attention span of a goldfish, the kinds of people who can follow a 20 second joke probably want more commentary based gameplay just food for thought.

Last point is turn your music volume down by 2-3 decibels. that will inturn feed back into point 1 making you sound more confident, which makes you more liked which means more views.

Also its vir-chu-oh-so you uncultured swine.

i blame the brofesco kunt too.


then i stopped after that. because its just as bad as brofresco.
